course_title: Land and Indigenous Self-Determination: Advanced Theoretical Perspectives

sections.comments: This section is offered as part of the Dechinta Certificate in Land Based Research and is not open for registration. Visit dechinta.ca for more information.

description: Theorizing land and self-determination from Indigenous cultural, political, and economic perspectives. Experiential, intensive land-based course designed and delivered in collaboration with academic faculty and Indigenous community partner(s).
